sense.name: brag
sense.examples: She boasted to anyone who would listen about her soccer-playing son. "My good looks have taken me far," he boasted. Josh boasts about his car, but I think it's a wreck.

sense.name: achieve or have something
sense.examples: McCarthy boasted the game-winning goal in Thursday's game. She has boasted a New York Times best-seller in each of the last 3 decades. The lodge boasts an Olympic-sized pool. Her pantry boasts nothing more than a jar of pickles and a box of crackers.
